articles.title: DreamCloud Mattress Sale: Save Up To 66% On Editor-Favorite Beds
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: DreamCloud is offering significant savings on new beds and bedding bundles, which include a mattress, base, and sheet set, during its mattress sale. This promotional event offers new deals on existing products.

articles.title: Marketing with purpose: Qhawekazi Mdikane on women, empowerment and momentum
articles.summary: L'Oréal launched Restore Plus, an ethnic haircare line under Dark & Lovely. South African Breweries (SAB) pioneered the launch of Flying Fish, South Africa's first flavoured beer. Momentum launched the Boost Her Boots Fund campaign focusing on helping athletes transition from success on the field to building sustainable futures off the field and extended the campaign with a film.

articles.title: AZK Media launches new PR solution for B2B technology companies
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: AZK Media has launched a new strategic PR solution to boost B2B tech companies' brand visibility across new AI search tools. The solution, designed for 'Gen Engine Optimisation' (GEO), focuses on building reputation across the internet to improve visibility in AI search results. AZK Media has also invested in reporting and tracking capabilities to measure clients' visibility in AI-generated results.

articles.title: Best Beauty Advent Calendars Of 2025
articles.author: Jane Sung
articles.summary: Several companies are launching beauty advent calendars for the holiday season. Augustinus Bader is releasing a calendar with 12 days of skincare formulas, while Jo Malone's calendar features popular fragrances. Charlotte Tilbury offers a 12-door box with beauty products including full-size favorites.

articles.title: Merriam-Webster Freaks People Out Over Dictionary Update — But There's A Very Funny Twist
articles.author: Elyse Wanshel
articles.summary: Merriam-Webster is launching a new edition of its collegiate dictionary, the 12th edition. The company announced the new product with a video on social media, initially teasing a new Large Language Model (LLM) before revealing it was an advertisement for the dictionary. The launch date for the new Large Language Model is announced as 11.18.25.

articles.title: Kindle Scribe vs. ReMarkable Paper Pro: I compared the two premium tablets, and here's the winner
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Amazon introduced the new Kindle Scribe Colorsoft featuring an 11-inch color display. The product is being compared to the ReMarkable Paper Pro.

articles.title: Skincare lovers adore 'youth activiating serum' - and it's 40% off
articles.author: Alice Rush
articles.summary: Lancôme's Advanced Génifique Youth Activating Serum, targeting visible signs of ageing, is available at LookFantastic.ie with a 40% discount, priced at €98.45. LookFantastic also sells Medik8 Hydr8 B5 Serum, a cheaper alternative priced at €51.95.

articles.title: I Tried Wendy's Newest Menu Item — And It's My Favorite Thing They've Ever Made
articles.author: Kaitlyn Luckoff
articles.summary: Wendy's launched 'Wendy's Tendys,' a new chicken tender menu item, along with six new and revamped dipping sauces including Wendy's Signature, Sweet Chili, Scorchin' Hot, Creamy Ranch, Honey BBQ, and Honey Mustard. The new chicken tenders are available in three-piece, four-piece orders, or in kids' meals, with a choice of sauces. The chicken tenders have a crispier, thicker seasoned breading.

articles.title: Where to pre-order the God of War 20th Anniversary Limited Edition DualSense controller tomorrow
articles.author: Games Radar
articles.summary: The Limited Edition God of War 20th Anniversary DualSense controller will become available for pre-order tomorrow. The DualSense controller celebrates the 20th anniversary of God of War game.

articles.title: New Mountain Dew flavor is taking the viral dirty soda trend to the next level
articles.author: Diane Mwai
articles.summary: PepsiCo is launching a new Mountain Dew flavor called 'Dirty Mountain Dew Cream Soda' in early 2026. This new flavor combines Mountain Dew's citrus taste with cream soda to capitalize on the growing dirty soda trend and targets consumers seeking customizable beverages. The product will be available for preview at the National Association of Convenience Stores convention before its national launch.

articles.title: Lamborghini considering more off-road variants and crazy specials
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: Lamborghini plans to apply the Sterrato theme to the Temerario, Urus SUV, and V12-powered Revuelto models. This move suggests potential future product updates or new variants within Lamborghini's lineup.

articles.title: Amazon Australia unveils Beauty Advent Calendar 2025: How to score over $570 worth of make up, hair and skincare for just $100
articles.author: ANDREA ROBERTSON
articles.summary: Amazon Australia has unveiled its 2025 Beauty Advent Calendar, featuring $570 worth of premium skincare, make up, and haircare products for $100. The calendar is available for pre-order and includes items from brands like Bioderma, Avène, Elizabeth Arden, L'Occitane, Laneige, and L'Oréal Professionnel.

articles.title: Perfect Corp. Releases Virtual Try-On for Glasses Update with New In-Platform Product Library Featuring Over 13,000 Pre-Loaded Glasses SKUs
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Perfect Corp. has updated its Online Service for Virtual Glasses Try-On by introducing a comprehensive digital library of over 13,000 glasses products. This update streamlines the onboarding process and accelerates the launch of virtual try-on experiences for brands.

articles.title: Member's Mark Expands Into Fresh Sushi
articles.summary: Sam's Club introduced sushi under the Member's Mark brand. This marks a significant advancement in Sam's Club's product offerings.

articles.title: Hunters and Tigers Split in National Baseball Series
articles.author: Glenda Flores Solano
articles.summary: TechGiant Inc. has launched Aura, an AI-powered personal assistant designed for personalized recommendations and task automation. The product was unveiled at a launch event in San Francisco and will be available for download on iOS and Android platforms next week with a subscription-based pricing model.

articles.title: Get Dyson's V11 Origin Cordless Vacuum for 36% Off Before Prime Big Deal Days Arrives
articles.author: Nick Hazleton
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a 36% discount on its V11 Origin Cordless Vacuum, bringing the price down to $400 for Prime members. The V11 is a versatile cordless vacuum with features such as a Motorbar Cleaner Head, Crevice Tool, Mini Soft Dusting Brush, and Hair Screw Tool, and it boasts up to 60 minutes of runtime per charge.

articles.title: Seminar Commemorates the 100 Years of the First Communist Party of Cuba
articles.author: Glenda Flores Solano
articles.summary: TechGiant Corp. announced the launch of Aura, an AI-powered personal assistant designed to integrate into daily life and offering features like task management and personalized recommendations. Aura will be available for purchase soon, and pre-orders are currently being accepted with a discount.

articles.title: What you should know about being ‘first to market'
articles.author: David Malcolm
articles.summary: A real estate company decided to purchase entire cul-de-sacs in Altadena to construct new single-family homes after the Eaton Fire in Los Angeles County. This first-to-market strategy aims to capitalize on residents' desire to rebuild and create community in the affected area, while navigating regulatory costs and material expenses.

articles.title: Productboard Unveils Productboard Spark: Specialized AI to Supercharge Product Managers
articles.summary: Productboard has launched Productboard Spark, an AI-first product agent designed to supercharge product managers across all aspects of their work. The new product is available to select beta customers and represents the company's vision for AI-first product management. Productboard Spark is available in invite-only private beta.

articles.title: This business is putting a new spin on trying to keep tourists in town
articles.author: Tess Kelly
articles.summary: Neale and Annette Gillett are launching Soft n Fluffy Laundrette and Furry Friends Pet Laundrette in Sheffield on October 4. Soft n Fluffy Laundrette offers laundry services for people, while Furry Friends Pet Laundrette provides separate machines for pet blankets and toys. The laundrette offers machines and dryers that hold up to 15 and 25 kilograms, respectively, with cycles starting at $9.

articles.title: cPanel/WHM & DirectAdmin reseller from $ 1.25/month
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: A hosting provider offers a reseller package, featuring 5 accounts, unlimited domains, 20 GB SSD disk space, and a WHM reseller panel. The service includes unlimited bandwidth, a one-click installer, free data migration, 24/7 technical support, fast setup, free unlimited SSL certificates (LetsEncrypt), and full whitelabeling.

articles.title: Meta Outline Expanding AI Ad Tools, Including AI Chatbots for Websites
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Meta is launching several new AI-powered features and products. These include 'Business AI,' a customizable AI agent for business websites, the 'Meta AI Business Assistant' within Meta Ads Manager, virtual try-on options, and AI-driven enhancements for ads such as AI-generated music, dubbing, and persona-based image generation. Meta is also expanding creator collaboration options with new tools and APIs.

articles.title: Everyone can use Perplexity's Comet AI browser now
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: The company is promoting Comet as a dynamic alternative to web browsers like Chrome and Safari. Comet is being positioned as the harbinger of a new era of search, indicating a new product or service launch.

articles.title: Here's Your Chance to Grab the Best Gifts During Amazon Prime Big Deal Days
articles.author: Elly Leavitt
articles.summary: During Amazon Big Deal Days, several products are being offered at discounted prices.  These include Apple watches, AirPods, Dyson vacuum cleaners, Biodance face masks, Café Couture Oven, Vitamix blenders, Kindle, Apple Watch SE, Kendra Scott jewelry, Fujifilm instant camera, Le Specs sunglasses, Le Creuset Dutch oven, and Nest candles, making them attractive gift options. The event provides an opportunity to purchase a variety of discounted products.

articles.title: How Click Rain's director of development leads with digital stewardship
articles.author: Submitted
articles.summary: Click Rain Inc. develops high-performance websites, focusing on user experience and leveraging Craft CMS for its flexibility and ease of content editing. The company emphasizes excellence in accessibility and functionality to serve a diverse audience effectively. They are also exploring using AI to create efficiencies in their code editing process.

articles.title: What Is Dot? DoorDash's New Delivery Robot Explained
articles.author: Bibiana Palacios
articles.summary: DoorDash has launched Dot, a next-generation autonomous delivery robot designed for urban logistics. Dot is an electric and compact robot, one-tenth the size of a car, capable of navigating bike lanes and sidewalks, reaching speeds up to 20 mph. It is currently being piloted in the Phoenix metropolitan area as part of DoorDash's Autonomous Delivery Platform.

articles.title: This laundry hack has saved me so much money
articles.author: Kate Franke
articles.summary: The Samsung Bespoke AI vented laundry combo completes a full wash and dry cycle all at once and has a superspeed cycle that completes a full wash and dry in only 68 minutes. This vented combo works like a traditional dryer and is fast and easy to use.

articles.title: Mountain Trail Soap Co. celebrates new location
articles.author: Storme Smith
articles.summary: Mountain Trail Soap Company celebrated the grand opening of its new location at 152 N. Trade St. The company offers handcrafted soaps and bath products inspired by natural ingredients and caters to individuals seeking relief from eczema and dry skin.

articles.title: Gifts Galore – Pokémon Legends Z-A bonuses
articles.author: Andrea Rollins
articles.summary: The Pokémon Company is launching Pokémon Legends Z-A on October 16, 2025, offering early purchase bonuses. These include a free Ralts and Gardevoirite stone via mystery gift before February 28, 2026, and 100 Pokeballs for digital version purchasers through a serial code. Additionally, pre-ordering the Mega Dimension DLC before February 28, 2026, grants a luxurious pokeball set and Holo-X and Holo-Y apparel items.

articles.title: Amazon now lets Prime members add items to completed orders
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: Amazon has launched a new shopping feature called 'Add to Delivery' for US Prime members. This feature allows users to add eligible items, like electronics, clothing, books, and groceries, to completed orders that haven't shipped yet, accessible through the Amazon app and mobile website. The added items won't incur extra shipping fees.

articles.title: Taiba launches its New Identity, showcasing Forward Hospitality and the Charm of Welcome
articles.author: Saudi Gazette
articles.summary: Taiba launched its new corporate identity at a ceremony in Riyadh. This transformation positions Taiba as a fully integrated company.

articles.title: Popsicle Nail Bars set to redefine South Africa's nail care industry
articles.author: SAT Articles
articles.summary: Popsicle Nail Bars is launching a new nail care service with a focus on service excellence, advanced hygiene standards, and digital innovation. The first two locations are set to open in December 2025 in Johannesburg, with plans to expand through a franchise model in 2026. Popsicle aims to differentiate itself by offering medical-grade hygiene, augmented reality consultations, exclusive signature treatments, and a fully integrated brand experience.

articles.title: New Nerds Gummy Clusters Variation Fans ‘Need' Is Finally Heading to Stores
articles.author: Marisa Losciale
articles.summary: Ferrara has launched Nerds Juicy Gummy Clusters, a new candy that is double the size of the original and features a juicy center. The candy is strawberry punch-flavored, coated with original Nerds, and is available at major retailers like Walmart, Target, and Kroger. It comes in various pack sizes with a suggested retail price ranging from $2.49 to $6.49.

articles.title: 10 AI Tools for Creating Business Logos
articles.author: Linda Taylor
articles.summary: Canva's AI Logo Generator enables businesses to design professional logos for free. Looka allows tailoring logos by adjusting colors, fonts, and layouts. Hatchful by Shopify offers customizable templates for different industries and allows creating and downloading logos for free. Other platforms include Design.com, LogoMaker, Tailor Brands, LogoAI, Brandmark, Placeit and Logo Genie.

articles.title: Wood May Rot, But This Bamboo SSD Always Stays Fresh
articles.author: Devesh Beri
articles.summary: Apacer has launched the AS712 Portable SSD, a 1TB storage device with an integrated essential oil diffuser. The SSD utilizes sustainable materials and USB 3.2 Gen2 interface, offering read speeds up to 1000 MB/s and write speeds up to 900 MB/s. The product supports multiple operating systems and comes with a USB-C cable, diffuser stone, and a three-year limited warranty.

articles.title: Pepsi Max fans divided over new flavour but some have already stocked up
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: PepsiCo is launching a new Pepsi Max flavor in Tesco stores. The new product's unique flavor is generating mixed reactions.

articles.title: Boyd to Present Rack Emulator for Multigenerational NVIDIA Blackwell and Rubin Rack Architectures at the 2025 OCP Global Summit
articles.summary: Boyd announced the introduction of its new Rack Emulator for NVIDIA GB200 NVL72 racks at OCP 2025. The Rack Emulator is designed to speed up the deployment of liquid-cooled NVIDIA Blackwell GPUs by simulating pressure drop and heat dissipation of multigenerational GPU racks, validating thermal performance before connecting to computing infrastructure. It supports up to 250 kW and can be viewed at the 2025 OCP Global Summit at Boyd's booth C18.

articles.title: Shoppers say 'I'll pass' as Pepsi reveals new seasonal flavour
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: Pepsi has launched a new, limited-edition Gingerbread Flavour Pepsi, which is expected to be available in selected Tesco stores this week. The product's release has generated mixed reactions from shoppers, with some expressing excitement and others indicating they will pass on trying it.

articles.title: AI comes to the video wars
articles.summary: OpenAI and other companies are experimenting with new applications of AI models, moving beyond chatbots to find 'killer apps' that are indispensable to users. This represents an effort to introduce novel AI-powered services or significantly update existing ones.

articles.title: AI comes to the video wars AI驰入视频战场
articles.summary: Since the launch of ChatGPT nearly three years ago, chatbots have dominated most people's experience with generative AI. This marks the beginning of a new experimental phase in AI applications, with chatbots being central to generative AI experiences.

articles.title: Amazon Fire HD tablet is less than £50 but not for long
articles.author: Oliver Astley
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Fire HD 8 tablet at a discounted price of £49.99. The tablet features an 8-inch HD screen, 32GB storage, and compatibility with streaming apps, Kindle, and Alexa. The offer is valid until October 14 and the Fire HD 8 is available in black, green, or pink.

articles.title: Which Roku streaming stick should you buy in 2025? I tested every model, and here's ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Roku has released updated Streaming Sticks featuring a refreshed design, maintaining the classic user experience. The updated products were tested in a home environment.

articles.title: Gatorade and Cheetos are among the Pepsi products getting a natural dye makeover
articles.author: The Sun Chronicle
articles.summary: Pepsi is facing challenges in maintaining the vivid and colorful appearance of its products, including Gatorade and Cheetos. This implies a focus on product presentation and quality, suggesting an ongoing effort to improve or update existing product characteristics.

articles.title: Tiny but mighty: The 4G phone that fits in your coin pocket
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: NanoPhone is a miniaturized smartphone with 4G, Wi-Fi, dual SIM support, and built-in cameras. It's available for $109.99 and targets travelers, adventurers, and minimalists.

articles.title: Shoppers can save £58 on ‘amazing' Shark hairdryer in Amazon deal
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a limited-time deal on the Shark SpeedStyle Hair Dryer, reducing the price from £219.99 to £161.98. This hairdryer is designed to prevent heat damage and features a Scalp Shield Mode. The article also references Dyson Supersonic Origin Hair Dryer and BaByliss Salon Pro 2200 Hair Dryer as alternative options.

articles.title: Need two lines on one phone? Try this $60 mini dual SIM smartphone
articles.author: Boing Boing'S Shop
articles.summary: The Mini 4G Dual SIM Smartphone is launching as a compact, Android-based device that supports two phone numbers. It features a 3" IPS HD touch screen, 5MP rear camera, 2MP front camera, 4G cellular and Wi-Fi support, and is available in black and silver. It is available for $59.97 until October 12.

articles.title: Sweetspot Farms dispensary opens in River Edge
articles.author: Tom Warnick
articles.summary: Sweetspot Farms has launched its newest dispensary in River Edge, New Jersey, marking their eighth dispensary location. To celebrate the grand opening, Sweetspot River Edge is offering 25% off storewide through Oct. 5.

articles.title: Pepsi Max fans divided over new flavour but some have already stocked up
articles.author: Lucy Marshall
articles.summary: Pepsi Max is launching a new, limited-edition Gingerbread flavor in Tesco stores, starting October 2nd. The sugar-free beverage features a gingerbread design and is described as a spiced, warming variation on the classic Pepsi Max, similar to the discontinued Pepsi Max Ginger.

articles.title: A.D.A.M. Innovations Launches GeneLink, the World's First Genetics-Powered Ad Platform
articles.author: A.D.A.M. Innovations
articles.summary: A.D.A.M. Innovations Co. launched GeneLink, a novel advertising platform. This platform integrates genetics, lifestyle insights, and artificial intelligence to provide precision marketing. GeneLink utilizes a large genomic database of the Japanese population.

articles.title: Calling all sports fans: Find all your favorite games with this streaming package
articles.author: Angela Tricarico
articles.summary: DIRECTV has launched the MySports Genre Pack, a streamlined package delivering key sports networks. It costs $69.99/month, with a limited-time offer of $59.99/month for the first two months after a five-day free trial. The package includes ESPN Unlimited and 20+ channels, with add-on options like MySports Extra and MyHome Team available.

articles.title: Spray and save: The Patoolio Pressure Washer is 45% off ahead of Prime Day
articles.author: P.J. McCormick
articles.summary: The Patoolio Pressure Washer is available on Amazon with a 45% discount before Amazon's Prime Big Deal Days. This pressure washer is equipped with quick-connect nozzles and is designed for deep cleaning of outdoor surfaces such as decks and driveways.

articles.title: Cubot X100 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Cubot announced the Cubot X100 smartphone in August 2025. The 5G-ready smartphone features a 5100 mAh battery with 33W wired charging, and is available in Gray and Gold. It runs on Android 15 and includes a 64MP main camera.

articles.title: Mod Op Expands AI Suite with Launch of Mod Heat, AI Coach and Ecommerce Agent
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Mod Op has launched Mod Heat, an AI-powered solution, along with AI Coach and Ecommerce Agent, expanding its AI solution suite. These AI tools aim to provide clients with actionable insights and efficiencies to enhance customer connections and streamline workflows, representing the initial outcomes of Mod Op's $10M AI investment.

articles.title: Leonardo DiCaprio rend hommage à Jane Goodall et révèle le dernier message qu'il lui a envoyé
articles.author: Stefania Saltalamacchia
articles.summary: An apparel company aims to promote its new line of high-end baby clothes by targeting young parents or couples who can be assumed to be wealthy and to have a new child. The company works with an agency to create profiles of potential customers for targeted advertising within partner apps.

articles.title: Innovative Washing Machine Detergent for Smarter Laundry Care
articles.author: Sponsored Post
articles.summary: Aspira Nigeria Limited has launched Viva Matic, a new high-performance detergent formulated for washing machines. Designed for convenience and efficiency, Viva Matic is available nationwide in major supermarkets, retail outlets, and online stores, aiming to revolutionize laundry routines for Nigerian families.

articles.title: Fisher & Paykel Unveils Reimagined New York Experience Center with Luxury Kitchens by Arclinea, Henrybuilt, and Space Theory
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Fisher & Paykel reopened its New York Experience Center after a strategic design renovation. The center showcases an extensive selection of the company's luxury appliances in a kitchen design. The space was designed by Fisher & Paykel's Global Design Team in partnership with Schiller Projects.

articles.title: Wowcher cuts price of Dyson vacuum users say has 'transformed housework'
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: Wowcher offers the refurbished Dyson V6 Cordless Handstick Vacuum for £99, a 48% discount. Lakeland has introduced the Lightweight 2-in-1 Cordless Vacuum for £99.99. Shark is selling the PowerPro Cordless Stick Vacuum for £199.99, highlighting its floor-sensing technology.

articles.title: Pepsi Max fans are buzzing after spotting new flavour but there's one big catch
articles.author: Lucy Marshall
articles.summary: Pepsi Max is launching a limited edition Gingerbread Pepsi Max drink in Tesco stores. The new sugar-free drink, available from October 2nd, features a gingerbread flavour and festive can design. Initial reactions shared on social media are divided, with some finding the flavour surprisingly good and reminiscent of the discontinued Pepsi Max Ginger.

articles.title: Meta Unveils AI Agents to Automate Ads for Brands and Shoppers
articles.author: Trishla Ostwal
articles.summary: Meta unveiled a suite of tools designed to help brands sell products and consumers discover them. These tools represent Meta's latest initiative toward automating advertising for brands, aligning with Mark Zuckerberg's vision.

articles.title: 10ZiG® Adds to Recent Major Firmware Release with Change to AVD Client adding Windows App Styling Refresh
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: 10ZiG Technology launched Firmware Release 16.5.39.1, featuring a Windows App Styling change to the AVD Client, offering a modern look and feel. This update aims to align the user experience with native Windows apps, providing consistency and potentially reducing future reworks.

articles.title: Sprouts Farmers Market Opens on Friday at Cloverleaf Shopping Center in Woodbridge
articles.author: TONY GALLOTTO
articles.summary: Sprouts Farmers Market opened a new supermarket in Woodbridge, NJ, on October 3rd, offering fresh baked goods, organic products, and services like pick-up, delivery, and catering. The store will also carry its own brand of products. The store is located at the new Cloverleaf Shopping Center.

articles.title: Best nude lipsticks to swear by for all your festive needs; Our top 8 picks for you
articles.author: Shweta Pandey
articles.summary: L'Oreal Paris introduced Infallible Matte Resistance Liquid Lipstick, offering smudge-proof color. Kiro launched Four Play Non-Stop Airy Matte Liquid Lip Stack featuring four shades. REVLON enhanced its Super Lustrous Creme Lipstick with vitamin E and avocado oil.

articles.title: Aldi is rebranding its products. Here's what New Hampshire shoppers can expect
articles.author: Rin Velasco
articles.summary: Aldi is rebranding its exclusive products to feature either the Aldi logo or a bold 'an Aldi Original' endorsement. Iconic brands like Clancy's, Simply Nature, and Specially Selected will remain with modernized branding. This packaging refresh is being rolled out to store shelves and will be implemented over the next few years across all products.

articles.title: Sunday Rose, la fille de Nicole Kidman et Keith Urban, défile pour Dior après l'annonce du divorce de ses parents
articles.author: Marita Alonso
articles.summary: An apparel company is promoting its new line of high-end baby clothes. The company uses an agency to create profiles of young, wealthy parents for targeted advertising within partner apps. This allows the apparel company to advertise its new product line to a very specific and relevant consumer group.

articles.title: DoorDash Announces New Innovations With Delivery Robots and App Enhancements
articles.summary: DoorDash announced the launch of DoorDash Dot, a fully electric, autonomous delivery robot. This innovation aims to connect customers to local retail, food, and beverages while empowering local economies.

articles.title: NEO Battery Signs Multi-Year Offtake Agreement for Silicon Battery Materials with North American Drone & UAS Battery Company
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: NEO Battery Materials has secured a multi-year offtake agreement to supply 50 tons of its NBMSiDE ® P-200 and P-300N silicon anode materials to a North American lithium-ion battery company. This is complemented by a Joint Development Agreement where NEO will collaborate on optimizing lithium-ion and lithium-polymer batteries, focusing on enhancing energy density and charging capabilities for applications in unmanned systems and drones.

articles.title: Pattern Launches Free GEO Scorecard to Show Ecommerce Brands How They Rank Against Competitors on LLM Engines
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Pattern Group Inc. has launched the Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) Scorecard, a free, self-service tool designed to help brands understand and optimize their product presentation on conversational AI platforms like ChatGPT. The GEO Scorecard provides brands with competitive analysis and actionable recommendations to improve their content, sentiment, and ranking on AI chat platforms, thereby maximizing visibility and growth in the evolving landscape of AI-driven commerce.

articles.title: Allesin No-Drill Smart Shades, Making Home Automation Easier Than Ever
articles.author: Allesin
articles.summary: Allesin has launched its no-drill smart shades in the U.S. market, offering a fast and easy installation and home automation solution for blinds. These motorized shades feature a no-drill system, cordless design, multiple control options, smart scheduling, and customizable sizing, providing convenience, safety, and a modern lighting solution for various living spaces.

articles.title: Our 5 Most Popular Soup Recipes Are So Good, I Couldn't Choose a Favorite
articles.author: Mary Claire Britton
articles.summary: The article reviews five soup recipes submitted to Allrecipes: Copycat Panera Broccoli Cheddar Soup, Fresh Tomato Soup, Absolutely Ultimate Potato Soup, Quick and Easy Chicken Noodle Soup, and The Best Thai Coconut Soup. Each recipe is evaluated based on depth of flavor, texture balance, and ease of preparation, offering insights into their characteristics and suitability for different preferences.

articles.title: Pattern Launches Free GEO Scorecard to Show Ecommerce Brands How They Rank Against Competitors on LLM Engines
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Pattern Group Inc. launched the Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) Scorecard, a free tool designed to help brands understand and optimize how conversational AI platforms like ChatGPT display their products. The GEO Scorecard provides actionable recommendations for brands to improve their performance against competitors.

articles.title: Need a new tablet? Amazon Fire Max 11 is 39% off for Prime Big Deal Days 2025
articles.author: Aaron Mamiit
articles.summary: Amazon offers a 39% discount on the Fire Max 11 tablet during Prime Big Deal Days 2025.

articles.title: Hoover PowerScrub Deluxe Carpet Cleaner with Upholstery Tools
articles.author: Abdul
articles.summary: Hoover introduces the PowerScrub Deluxe, a home cleaning system with a dual tank system for easy filling and emptying. The PowerScrub Deluxe features automatic solution mixing and multiple attachments for versatile cleaning on carpets, rugs, furniture, and stairs.

articles.title: Top-Quality Grocery Store Ice Creams That Are Worth The Splurge
articles.author: Carlos Matias
articles.summary: Jeni's Ice Cream uses wholesome ingredients sourced responsibly. Van Leeuwen offers French-style custard-based ice cream with unique flavors. Graeter's uses the French pot batch process for their ice cream. Salt & Straw built its reputation on unusual flavors, collaborating with local farms. McConnell's builds its ice cream from scratch and Cado offers dairy-free ice cream made with avocado. Double Rainbow focuses on classic flavors, while Thrifty Ice Cream still follows its original recipe. Rebel Ice Cream focuses on low glycemic index ice cream. My/Mochi offers ice cream wrapped in mochi dough. Talenti Gelato Layers combines gelato with mix-ins and sauces. Tillamook packs in more cream for a denser texture.

articles.title: PepsiCo's new challenge: Making its chips and sodas colorful without artificial dyes
articles.author: Morning Times
articles.summary: Pepsi faces the challenge of maintaining the vivid and colorful appearance of its products like Gatorade and Cheetos. This ongoing effort relates to the product management and development news.

articles.title: Montreal's Heylist Launches AI Search in the U.S. Creator Economy Market Français
articles.author: Heylist Inc
articles.summary: Heylist launched its SaaS platform in the United States, which connects brands with emerging creators. The platform features AI Search, enabling instantaneous matching of brands with creators based on visual content and profiles. Heylist automates brand–creator collaboration through profile verification, recruitment, campaign management, post tracking, and audience analytics.

articles.title: Google AI Mode now lets you search with pictures and get visual inspiration
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google is launching a new visual results functionality within its AI Mode in Google Search. This feature, powered by Gemini 2.5, allows users to ask conversational questions and receive visual search results. Currently available in the United States, it will expand to other regions in the future.

articles.title: Key Content by MarketFully launches Adaptive Creation, AI-powered tech helping to deliver nuanced multilingual content marketing for today's era
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Key Content, a MarketFully company, has launched Adaptive Creation, an AI-powered technology integrated into the MarketFully.AI platform. This new service assists marketing teams in efficiently creating high-performing multilingual content at scale, combining AI speed with editorial precision for various marketing assets.

articles.title: Colorado-founded Ziggi's Coffee brewing up first North Dakota shop in South Fargo
articles.summary: Ziggi's Coffee is launching its first North Dakota location in Fargo this November. The new cafe will feature a drive-thru and offer Ziggi's full menu, including Dirty Sodas, fall-themed beverages like the Mike's Hot Honey Latte and Starry Not Your Granny's Apple Dirty Soda, breakfast burritos, paninis and baked goods. Ziggi's also operates a rewards program that allows customers to earn free drinks, rewards dollars and exclusive offers.

articles.title: 5 On Your Side: Tips on how to save money in the laundry room
articles.author: Consumer Reports
articles.summary: LG Washer & LG DLEX4000W Dryer earns top efficiency scores in Consumer Reports tests.

articles.title: Amazon's latest Android tablet is less than £50 for a limited time
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Fire HD 8 tablet at a discounted price of £49.99 until October 14, 2025. The tablet features an 8-inch HD screen, 32GB storage, and access to streaming apps and Alexa, making it suitable for content consumption and basic tasks. An ad-free version is available for £59.99.

articles.title: Southampton opens new Sip and Spin Cafe and Laundry
articles.author: Emma McCorkindale
org: Sip and Spin Cafe and Laundry
articles.summary: Sip and Spin Cafe and Laundry is opening in Southampton, offering customers the chance to enjoy coffee while doing their laundry. Located at 15 College Highway, they will host its grand opening with a ribbon-cutting ceremony. They will be serving Counter Culture coffee, smoothies, and fresh baked treats.

articles.title: Santander launches new current account with £240 a year in cash change
articles.author: Ben Hurst
articles.summary: Santander UK has launched the Edge Explorer current account with benefits like cashback, travel insurance, and access to a high-interest savings account, but it comes with a monthly fee of £17. The account offers up to £20 cashback monthly and a 6% AER savings account. Nationwide's FlexPlus account is presented as an alternative.

articles.title: Starbucks registers new trademark in Russia
articles.summary: Starbucks registered a new trademark in Russia, suggesting a strategic effort to maintain the brand's presence in the Russian market. This indicates a potential introduction of new products, services, or a brand refresh within the region.

articles.title: Nestlé Professional: Serving more than coffee
articles.author: Neesha Salian
articles.summary: The 'We Proudly Serve Starbucks Coffee Programme' enables hotels in the MENA region to offer handcrafted Starbucks beverages. Nestle Professional provides equipment, training, and marketing support, allowing hotels to enhance guest satisfaction and reinforce brand quality by serving familiar Starbucks favorites.

articles.title: DigitalOcean Expands AI Ecosystem, Launches Partner Program to Accelerate Innovation and Empower Startups and Builders
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: DigitalOcean has launched the DigitalOcean AI Partner Program and expanded its AI offerings within the DigitalOcean AI Ecosystem. These initiatives aim to create a comprehensive environment for building AI applications by bringing together technology innovators, systems integrators, venture firms, and AI-native startups. The DigitalOcean AI Ecosystem allows customers to explore DigitalOcean's comprehensive cloud and helps enterprises create and deploy AI applications.

articles.title: Honor Magic V5 review: Best foldable phone for design, battery and everyday use
articles.author: Noel Campion
articles.summary: Honor has launched the Magic V5, a new foldable smartphone featuring a slim design, upgraded hinge, and vibrant displays. The device boasts a top-notch camera system with a 64MP telephoto lens, Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, and a large 5820mAh battery, delivering premium performance and class-leading battery life. The price is €1,800 at Harvey Norman.

articles.title: Hozo NeoBlade review: A wireless ultrasonic cutter that redefines precision
articles.author: Noel Campion
articles.summary: Hozo has launched the NeoBlade, a wireless ultrasonic cutter that uses 40,000 vibrations per second to cut through various materials. The company also introduced the NeoBlock, a modular sanding system designed for finishing surfaces, especially beneficial for 3D print finishing and model work.

articles.title: 29 Cheaper Versions Of Expensive Products So Spot-On That You'll Gaslight Yourself Into Thinking You Bought The Real Thing
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Kuumba Made is launching a Creamy Coconut fragrance rollerball, compared to Sol de Janeiro. E.l.f. introduces the Glow Reviver Melting Lip Balm, and Essence unveils Drop of Sunshine Bronzing Drops. E.l.f. also expands its Holy Hydration line with Thirst Burst Drops and launches Halo Glow Liquid Filter.

articles.title: Revlon India eyes top five spot in the beauty care market
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: The company is planning to introduce a new 'glimmer' product targeting young girls. This represents a launch of a new product aimed at a specific demographic.

articles.title: All-New Audi Q5 Debuts in Oman: Performance, Digital Innovation, and Everyday Luxury Combined
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Audi has launched the all-new Audi Q5 in Oman. The vehicle features advancements in performance, technology, and design.

articles.title: Aldar Introduces Its Urban Living Collection To Yas Island
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Aldar has launched Yas Living, an apartment complex, bringing its urban 'living collection' to Yas Island.

articles.title: Alibaba's Amap hits record 360 million users as China's National Day ‘golden week' begins
articles.author: Xinmei Shen
articles.summary: Amap, an Alibaba Group service, introduced the 'Eagle Eye Guardian' road safety alert system, issuing over 290 million alerts on Wednesday. Additionally, Amap launched an AI assistant named 'Xiaogao' in August, which processed over 2.6 billion user requests on Wednesday. Last month, Alibaba unveiled a feature called Amap Street Stars, which uses AI to rank offline destinations such as restaurants, hotels and tourist attractions.

articles.title: Top-rated appliance brand Tefal launches at-home ice cream maker and shoppers are already ‘very impressed'
articles.author: Holly Hampton-Thayers
articles.summary: Tefal has launched Dolci, a new kitchen appliance for making frozen treats, featuring 10 different programs. It retails for $349.95 and has a 1.4L capacity. To celebrate the launch, Tefal is collaborating with Nestlé, offering Nesquik with every purchase, and includes a digital recipe book.

articles.title: AIS Celebrates 35 Years with AI-Powered Digital Future
articles.summary: AIS is celebrating its 35th anniversary by launching the 'AIS 1 Point 12 Weeks 12 Wow' campaign, offering exclusive privileges to its 51 million customers starting October 1, 2025. The company is also expanding into digital finance by collaborating with OR and KTB to develop a Virtual Bank, aimed at increasing access to financial services for all Thais.

articles.title: Zoho Unveils Vani, An AI-Powered Visual Platform Set To Rival Google Workspace: Here's How It Works
articles.author: Rahul M
articles.summary: Zoho has introduced Vani, a visual-first ecosystem aimed at small and medium-sized businesses, featuring AI-powered tools for ideation, planning, and execution within a consolidated platform. Vani operates on a "Space and Zone" model for real-time collaboration and supports whiteboarding, mind mapping, and native video calling, with pricing starting at Rs. 240 per teammate per month.

articles.title: Primers & Setting Sprays for a Flawless, Long-Lasting Look
articles.summary: New makeup products including primers and sprays are available. These products offer features like blurring pores, providing a matte finish, hydration, SPF protection, and a glass-like glow. The products contain ingredients like Vitamin B6, Niacinamide, and Hyaluronic Acid and are being promoted for purchase.

articles.title: AZK Media unveils AI search-focused PR solution for B2B tech
articles.author: IT Brief New Zealand
articles.summary: AZK Media launched a PR solution designed for B2B tech firms. This solution focuses on third-party endorsements to enhance visibility in AI-driven search results. The PR solution replaces the traditional SEO.

articles.title: Time to Break up with Your Phone? Samsung Says #YouDeserveMore
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics MENA has launched the #YouDeserveMore campaign, promoting the Galaxy Z Flip7 and Galaxy Z Fold7. The campaign emphasizes advanced features such as AI-powered tools, best-in-class camera experiences, and innovative design, encouraging users to switch to Samsung for a better mobile experience.

articles.title: Best La Mer dupe: The $30 night cream sold at Woolworths that shoppers say is identical to $955 La Mer product
articles.author: Sophie Haslett
articles.summary: Daily Skincare has launched its Double Ceramide Miracle Night Cream in 897 Woolworths stores nationally. The product, priced at $30, is marketed as a dupe for La Mer's moisturiser and offers hydration and skin-plumping benefits, resulting in over 200,000 units sold and revenue growth exceeding 400 per cent.

articles.title: King-size mattress: Price drop with up to 80% off on Amazon; comfortable sleep on a budget!
articles.author: Neha Ravi Khandelwal
articles.summary: Several companies like Sleepyhead, Kurl-On, Wakefit, Livpure, The Sleep Company, Centuary Sleepables, SleepyCat, and Flo are introducing or promoting king-size mattresses. Each mattress features unique designs and technologies, such as BodyIQ orthopaedic memory foam (Sleepyhead), reversible design (Kurl-On), ShapeSense Orthopaedic (Wakefit), CurvX foam (Livpure), SmartGRID (The Sleep Company), dual-sided design (Centuary Sleepables), PinHole Tech latex (SleepyCat), and PainRelease technology (Flo), all intended to provide tailored comfort and support.

articles.title: Vintage Modern Accelerates Growth with Thriving Production and Delighted Owners
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Vintage Modern is now delivering fully modernized classic cars inspired by the first-generation Ford Bronco, built on a modern 2025 Ford chassis with features like airbags, advanced safety systems, and luxury touches. The company has also launched a redesigned website with detailed vehicle listings and an online configurator for customization options, reflecting their blend of classic design and modern innovation.

articles.title: Truff'elle Australia Announces Launch of Luxury Truffle Infused Skincare
articles.summary: Truff'elle Australia has launched an exclusive skincare line featuring Australian-grown black truffle known for its antioxidant and collagen-boosting properties. The brand produces limited batches of its products to ensure freshness and potency, combining the truffle extract with ingredients like peptides and hyaluronic acid. The products are designed to restore the skin's natural glow and brightness.

articles.title: Opera Launches Its AI-Centric Neon Browser
articles.summary: Opera has launched its AI-centric browser, Neon, allowing users to create apps using AI prompts and repeatable prompts through a feature called 'Cards'. This release follows Opera's initial announcement in May, with the browser now transitioning from a closed preview to public availability.

articles.title: Feel Like A Pro Traveler With These 42 Reviewer-Loved Things
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: The article showcases a range of travel-oriented products, including Tide sink packs and to-go pens for clothing care, Munchkin travel strollers and snack catchers for children, and Neutrogena makeup remover towelettes for convenient cleansing. Other products include a Bounce wrinkle release spray for clothing, Hairbrella for hair protection, and LifeStraw for water purification, each offering solutions for specific travel-related needs.

articles.title: Anthropic Launches Claude Sonnet 4.5, Its Best AI Model for Coding
articles.summary: Anthropic has launched Claude Sonnet 4.5, a new frontier model boasting state-of-the-art coding performance. This model is designed for building 'production-ready' applications and is available via the Claude API and Claude chatbot. The developer pricing remains the same as the previous model.

articles.title: Samsung's ‘Biggest Ever Super Screen' is a 115-Inch Monster Worth $27,000
articles.author: Nick Hall
articles.summary: Samsung Australia has launched its 115-inch Neo QLED QN90F TV, powered by the NQ8 AI Gen3 Processor and featuring technologies like Vision AI and Glare Free. Available for pre-order, the TV is priced at AUD$26,999, and early buyers receive a $1,000 bonus for online purchases.

articles.title: Julia Roberts a prêté son légendaire costume Armani à son fils
articles.author: Alfredo Toriello
articles.summary: An apparel company is promoting its new line of high-end baby clothes. They are partnering with an agency to create profiles of wealthy, young parents to target them with advertising within partner apps. This strategy leverages user profiling to promote the new product line.

articles.title: Wendy's Debuts New Menu Item With a Lineup of 6 Bold Dipping Sauces - And They're Here to Stay
articles.author: Julie Andrews
articles.summary: Wendy's has launched its all-new chicken tenders, called 'Tendys,' as a core menu item nationwide. Along with the Tendys, Wendy's introduced six new dipping sauces, including Wendy's Signature, Sweet Chili, Scorchin' Hot, Creamy Ranch, Honey BBQ, and Honey Mustard, enhancing the dipping experience with new packaging designed for dunking.

articles.title: Salon opens in Market Heights
articles.author: Killeen Daily Herald
articles.summary: Drybar, a salon business, has opened its inaugural location in Harker Heights, introducing its salon services to the new market.

articles.title: Experts raise red flags over 'alpha-level' Tesla driving feature: 'It should never be in the customer's hands'
articles.summary: Tesla's Full Self-Driving (FSD) feature version 13.2.9, as tested in a Model Y during a 90-minute drive in Los Angeles, exhibited frequent errors. The assessment indicates the system is not yet ready for customers despite its high cost.

articles.title: Nigeria@65: Konga drops product prices for Nigerians through Freedom Sales promo
articles.author: Prince Osuagwu
articles.summary: Konga launched a Freedom Sale promotion to mark Nigeria's 65th Independence Anniversary, offering discounts on various products.  KongaCares and Zinox technologies also launched an initiative in September aimed at computerizing Nigeria by distributing one million laptops to young Nigerians with flexible payment plans.

articles.title: 15 Things We've Tried And Loved This Month October '25
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Avatara launched a boba-inspired face mask. Scrub Daddy introduced an all-purpose cleaning cream in partnership with Cif. Mizani released 25 Benefit Miracle Milk, a leave-in conditioner. Casetify launched a MagSafe compatible portable charger. JZD collaborated with Pond's to launch a sweatsuit line. Nike launched Nike Grind Dumbbells. Serena Williams' makeup brand, WYN Beauty, released a cheek and lip color. Sol de Janeiro launched Cheirosa 59 Hair & Body Perfume Mist.

articles.title: LG Electronics unveils new smart housing models
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: LG Electronics Inc. unveiled new modular home appliances on Thursday. This launch signifies the introduction of a new product line by the company.

articles.title: Good news GeForce gamers, Nvidia has a significant update for your gaming laptop
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: Nvidia is updating its Nvidia App, introducing new features such as BatteryBoost and WhisperMode for gaming laptops utilizing GeForce GPUs. The update enhances Project G-Assist, Nvidia's in-house AI system, with new settings controls.

articles.title: Paige DeSorbo swears by this on-sale hair oil: ‘If I could douse my whole body ...
articles.author: New York Post
articles.summary: Amazon is offering bargains on products like Nexxus, a hair product. This promotion coincides with the upcoming October Prime Day sales event.

articles.title: Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO Celebrates Over 200 Characters, Teases News of More in 2026
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: Bandai Namco launched Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO for Xbox Series X/S, PS5, and PC. A Nintendo Switch version is launching next month, and a trailer has been released to celebrate released characters.

articles.title: KULR Technology Redefines Battery Safety and Reliability Standards with Next-Gen Battery Management System
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: KULR Technology Group, Inc. launched its next generation KULR-developed Battery Management System.

articles.title: I tried Nando's new viral Mac and Cheese wrap - one major thing stood out
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Nando's has launched a new menu featuring new flavors. A Mirror writer tested the new PERi-Mac Wrap to assess its quality.

articles.title: Lighting Innovation at Its Best: Exploring the Olight New Series
articles.summary: Olight, known for portable lighting, has launched a new series of flashlights and accessories. This launch redefines customer expectations for modern illumination tools, building on Olight's reputation for innovation, capability, and durability among outdoor adventurers, professionals, and everyday users.
